title: Angular AppShell Options Schema
description: Generates an app shell for running a server-side version of an app.

clientProject.description: The name of the related client app.

universalProject.description: The name of related Universal app.

route.description: Route path used to produce the app shell.

name.description: The HTML selector of the Universal app

appId.description: The app ID to use in withServerTransition().

outDir.description: The output directory for build results.

root.description: The root directory of the app.

index.description: The name of the index file

main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

test.description: The name of the test entry-point file.

tsconfigFileName.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

testTsconfigFileName.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file for tests.

appDir.description: The name of the application directory.

rootModuleFileName.description: The name of the root module file

rootModuleClassName.description: The name of the root module class.

sourceDir.description: The path of the source directory.
